'''Genesis Crystals''' are the paid currency in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

==Info==
'''Genesis Crystals''' are the premium special currency in ''Genshin Impact''. They can only be obtained through in-game purchases. These crystals can be converted to {{Item|Primogem|text=Primogems|30}} on a 1:1 ratio.

The ability to purchase Genesis Crystals from different sources will vary depending on the platform the Genshin Impact account was created on:
*'''PC:''' Can make purchases from any source, though purchases made through PlayStation Network can only be accessed on a PS4/PS5.
*'''iOS:''' Can make purchases through the Apple App Store, as well as the Genshin Top-Up Center, Codashop, and Razer Gold.
*'''Android:''' Can make purchases through the Google Play Store, as well as the Genshin Top-Up Center, Codashop, and Razer Gold.
*'''PlayStation:''' Can only make purchases through PlayStation Network. Purchases made this way can only be accessed on a PS4/PS5.
**It is possible to make purchases through the Genshin Top-Up Center, Codashop, or Razer Gold, though those purchases can only be accessed on a non-PlayStation device. A [[Blessing of the Welkin Moon]] purchased in this manner will result in the daily rewards being accessible on a PS4/PS5, but accessing the 300 Genesis Crystals will require a non-PlayStation device.
{{Item|Primogem|text=Primogems|30}} converted from Genesis Crystals can always be accessed on any platform.
